title: Mock Draft + Superflex Strategies, The Nasty Man - Fantasy Football Podcast for 7/29
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a mock draft episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Mike and Jason go head-to-head in a superflex mock draft. Find out what strategies the guys use when they can’t wait until the later rounds to draft a QB! Plus, news out of training camp and Buy or Sell! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for July 29th, 2021.
  
 Dominate your fantasy football draft with the 2021 Ultimate Draft Kit -- get the Draft Analyzer with the UDK+ 
 Full Mock Draft Results on Sleeper
  
 (04:25) - Buy or Sell
 (09:50) - NFL News, Training Camp
 (18:20) - Mock Draft, Superflex Strategies 
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Want even more fantasy football goodness? Visit our Community Forums to chat everything fantasy football, or JoinTheFoot.com to join our fantasy football community.
  
 Check out today's sponsors:
  
 Modern Finance Podcast
 Fantasy Champs -- Code: FREERING
 Pristine Auction -- Registration Code - BALLERS
 Sleeper
 Support this podcast 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
